title: turtlebot3 can not appear in gzweb

content.raw:
As in the title, it seems like I can't load mesh of turtlebot3 in gzweb. I have already copy models to /gzweb/http/clients/assets. Lauched turtlebot3 from catkin_ws. In web browser, I can only see collision model, but no physical model. 

Thanks a lot.
content.html:
As in the title, it seems like I can't load mesh of turtlebot3 in gzweb. I have already copy models to /gzweb/http/clients/assets. Lauched turtlebot3 from catkin_ws. In web browser, I can only see collision model, but no physical model.

Thanks a lot.
